argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | orrvccel.1 | |- ( ph -> P e. Prob ) |
| 2 |  | orrvccel.2 | |- ( ph -> X e. ( rRndVar ` P ) ) |
| 3 |  | orrvccel.4 | |- ( ph -> A e. V ) |
| 4 | 1, 2 | #P_rrvdm | |- ( ph -> dom X = U. dom P ) |
| 5 | 4 | #P_eleq2d | |- ( ph -> ( z e. dom X <-> z e. U. dom P ) ) |
| 6 | 5 | #P_biimprd | |- ( ph -> ( z e. U. dom P -> z e. dom X ) ) |
| 7 | 6 | #P_imdistani | |- ( ( ph /\ z e. U. dom P ) -> ( ph /\ z e. dom X ) ) |
| 8 | 1, 2 | #P_rrvfn | |- ( ph -> X Fn U. dom P ) |
| 9 |  | #P_fnfun | |- ( X Fn U. dom P -> Fun X ) |
| 10 | 8, 9 | #P_syl | |- ( ph -> Fun X ) |
| 11 | 10, 2, 3 | #P_elorvc | |- ( ( ph /\ z e. dom X ) -> ( z e. ( X oRVC R A ) <-> ( X ` z ) R A ) ) |
| 12 | 7, 11 | #P_syl | |- ( ( ph /\ z e. U. dom P ) -> ( z e. ( X oRVC R A ) <-> ( X ` z ) R A ) ) |
